00036 class uvm_component;

00038 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 //
00040 // CLASS: uvm_manager
00041 //
00042 // Internal implementation class.
00043 // Stores global settings, and implements most of the global functions.
00044 // A singleton instance of this class is created for a given simulation run.
00045 //
00046 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 
00053 class uvm_manager {
00054 public:
00055 
00056   friend class uvm_component;
00057 
00058   static uvm_manager* get_manager();
00059 
00060   uvm_component* find_component(const char* name);
00061   uvm_component* find_module(const char* name);
00062   std::vector<uvm_component*> find_all(const char* name = ".*");
00063   std::vector<uvm_component*> find_all_module(const char* name);
00064 
00065   unsigned int get_num_tops();
00066   void set_top(const std::vector<sc_core::sc_module *>& tops);
00067   void set_top(sc_core::sc_module* comp);
00068   std::vector<sc_core::sc_module*> get_tops();
00069   std::vector<uvm_component*>      get_uvm_component_tops();
00070 
00071 protected:
00072 
00073   uvm_manager();
00074   ~uvm_manager();
00075 
00076   void do_kill_all();
00077   void do_kill(sc_core::sc_module* mod);
00078   
00079 protected:
00080 
00081   static uvm_manager* m_mgr;
00082          
00083   std::vector<sc_core::sc_module*> m_tops;
00084 };
00085 
00086 inline
